bounded_contexts.name: Product Catalog
bounded_contexts.purpose: Manages product information, categorization, and browsing capabilities for customers and administrators

ubiquitous_language.Category: A logical grouping of related products for browsing
ubiquitous_language.Product: A purchasable item with name, description, and price
ubiquitous_language.SKU: Stock Keeping Unit - unique identifier for a product variant
ubiquitous_language.Variant: A specific configuration of a product (e.g., size/color combination)

bounded_contexts.name: Inventory Management
bounded_contexts.purpose: Tracks stock levels, manages availability, and handles stock reservations for order fulfillment
capabilities: Notify when products go out of stock

ubiquitous_language.Available Quantity: Stock available for new orders (stock level minus reserved)
ubiquitous_language.Reservation: Temporary hold on inventory for a pending order
ubiquitous_language.Reserved Quantity: Stock allocated to pending orders but not yet shipped
ubiquitous_language.Restock: Adding new inventory to increase stock level
ubiquitous_language.Stock Level: Total quantity of a product in warehouse

bounded_contexts.name: Shopping Cart
bounded_contexts.purpose: Manages the shopping experience including cart operations and checkout preparation

ubiquitous_language.Cart: A temporary collection of products a customer intends to purchase
ubiquitous_language.Cart Item: A product with specified quantity in the cart
ubiquitous_language.Checkout: Process of converting cart contents to an order
ubiquitous_language.Total Price: Sum of all cart item subtotals

bounded_contexts.name: Order Management
bounded_contexts.purpose: Handles the complete order lifecycle from placement through delivery or cancellation

ubiquitous_language.Fulfillment: Process of preparing and shipping an order
ubiquitous_language.Line Item: An immutable snapshot of a product at order time
ubiquitous_language.Order: A confirmed customer purchase with shipping and payment details
ubiquitous_language.Order Status: Current state in the order lifecycle (pending, confirmed, shipped, delivered, cancelled)

bounded_contexts.name: Customer Management
bounded_contexts.purpose: Manages customer registration, authentication, and customer-related operations
capabilities: Associate customers with carts and orders

ubiquitous_language.Customer: A registered user who can browse and purchase products
ubiquitous_language.Registered Customer: A customer who has completed registration and can place orders
ubiquitous_language.Registration: Process of creating a customer account

context_relationships.description: Shopping Cart consumes product information (id, name, price) from Catalog when adding items to cart
Inventory tracks stock for products defined in Catalog
Shopping Cart checks product availability from Inventory before adding items
Order Management receives cart contents during checkout to create orders
Shopping Cart is associated with a Customer; each customer has one cart
Orders belong to Customers; registration status is validated before order placement
Inventory reserves stock when order is placed and releases on cancellation
